description.lang: Z-Wave Roller Shutter Controller is an ideal for the remotely electric motor controller. It is used to control the motors of rollers, shades, blinds, venetian blinds and similar sun shade, which are single phase AC powered. The module can be controlled either through a Z-Wave network or through the wall switch, and measures power consumption of motor.

name.lang: Set the power changed percentage to send the power report

description.lang: Set the power changed percentage to send the power report.0: Disabled1 - 100: 1% - 100%

name.lang: Set the time interval of reporting watts in seconds

description.lang: Set the time interval of reporting watts in seconds.0: Disable60 - 32767: 60 - 32767sec

name.lang: Set the time interval of reporting KWH in seconds

description.lang: Set the time interval of reporting KWH in seconds.0: Disable60 - 32767: 60 - 32767sec
External switch Protection:0: Enable external switch1: Disable external switch

name.lang: When the door is opened, set the delay time for automatic closing.

description.lang: When the door is opened, set the delay time for automatic closing.0: Disable automatic closing1 - 32767: The door will be closed automatically in 1 - 32767sec

name.lang: When the door is open, set the delay time for automatic notification

description.lang: When the door is open, set the delay time for automatic notification0: Disable automatic notification1 - 32767: The notification will be sent automatically in 1 - 32767sec
Set the operation mode:0: Roller Shutter1: Venetian (up/down and slate rotation)
Set the slats turning time:1 - 127: 0.1 - 12.7 sec

name.lang: Set the delay time to start the motor up to the blade

description.lang: Set the delay time to start the motor up to the blade:0: No offset time1 - 127: 0.1 - 12.7 sec

name.lang: Set the delay time to start the motor down to the blade

description.lang: Set the delay time to start the motor down to the blade.0: No offset time1 - 127: 0.112.7 sec
